original: Lönegren, Axel, landsfiskal, Växjö, f. 18/9/83 i Växjö av häradsskriv. Carl Magnus Ernst L. o. Dorotea Elisabet Jenny Lindergren. G. m. Hedvig Bergklint-Hyllengren. Barn: Karin f. 14, Märta 16, Irma o. Britta 19. — Efter partiell mog:ex. samt tjg. å kronolänsmans- o. kronofogdekont. läns-mansex. i Växjö 07. E. o. landskansi. v. länsistyr. där s. å., förordn. som tf. 0. e. landskansi. samt tf. kronolänsman i ol. distr. t. 12, kronolänsman i Kinnevalds distr. 12, landsfiskal i Bergunda distr. 18, dito i Norrvidinge distr. 41, därjämte innehaft förordn. som stadsfiskal i Växjö samt uppr. förordn. att förrätta mantalsiskrivn. i 01. socknar. Huvudman, styr:suppl. o. ombudsman i Urshults Sockens Sparbank samt led. av styr. f. Sydsv. Kredit A-B. kont. i Urshult ol. tider 13-17, rättens ombudsman i konkurser sied. 12, ordf. i tax:- o. beredn ndr i flera distr. sed. 13, skattmäst. i Mell. Värends doms. tingshuskomrru sed. 18, rev. o. siffergransk. i vägstyr, f. Kinnevalds vägdistr. 18-43 samt i Kinnevalds här :kassa sed. 18, förordn. bitr. domhav. i Mell. Värends doms. v. röstsammanräkn. v. landstingsman-navalet i tredje valkr. 19, ordf. i styr. f. Kronob. länsavd. av fören. Sv:es landsfiskaler sed. 28.
translated:
Lönegren, Axel, district fiscal, Växjö, born on September 18, 1883 in Växjö, son of district clerk Carl Magnus Ernst L. and Dorotea Elisabet Jenny Lindergren. Married to Hedvig Bergklint-Hyllengren. Children: Karin born in 1914, Märta in 1916, Irma and Britta in 1919.

After partial secondary school exams and serving at the county chief constable and county bailiff office, he became an assistant district fiscal in Växjö in 1907. He was appointed as acting and deputy assistant district fiscal, as well as deputy county constable in various districts until 1912. He became a county constable in Kinnevald district in 1912, district fiscal in Bergunda district in 1918, and in Norrvidinge district in 1941, also serving as city fiscal in Växjö and carrying out census registrations in several parishes.

He was a board member, supervisory substitute, and representative of Urshults Sockens Savings Bank, as well as a board member of South Sweden Credit AB. He worked at the Urshult branch from 1913 to 1917, served as a court representative in bankruptcies since 1912, chairman of the taxation and preparation committee in several districts since 1913, treasurer at the Central Värends District Court since 1918, auditor for the road authority in Kinnevald road district from 1918 to 1943, and for the Kinnevald county treasury since 1918.

He was appointed as an assistant judge at the Central Värends District Court for vote counting in the county council election in the third electoral district in 1919, chairman of the board for the Kronoberg county division of the Swedish District Fiscals Association since 1928.

memberOf.name: Kronoborg County Division of the Swedish District Fiscals Association
